monster.name: Aeorian Absorber
languages: understands Draconic però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The absorber té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: If the absorber moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits its claws attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 17} or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the absorber can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The absorber fa tres atacs: one with its bite or Mind Bolt and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Mind Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic.

reaction.name: Tail Ray
entries: When the absorber takes damage from a spell, the absorber takes only half the triggering damage. If the spellcaster is within 60 feet of the absorber, the absorber can force the caster to make a {@dc 16} Destresa saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the caster takes the other half of the damage.

monster.name: Aeorian Nullifier
languages: understands Draconic però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The nullifier's és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Horrid Gnashing
entries: The nullifier's mouths gnash incoherently while it can see any enemies. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nullifier and can hear it ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16}. Unless the save succeeds, the creature rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during the current turn:
1-4: The creature is {@condition stunned} until the end of the turn.
5-6: The creature is {@condition frightened} until the end of the turn and uses its movement to get as far as possible from the nullifier.
7-8: The creature doesn't move, and it uses its action to make one melee attack against a random creature (other than itself) if one is within reach. It otherwise does nothing.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The nullifier té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nullifier fa tres atacs: one with its bites and two with its claws.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de força.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de força, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar) if it's a creature. The nullifier has two claws, each of which can grapple one creature.

reaction.name: Counterspell
entries: The nullifier attempts to interrupt a creature that it can see within 60 feet in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, the nullifier makes a Carisma check with a DC equal to 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

monster.name: Aeorian Reverser
languages: understands Draconic però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The reverser té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The reverser fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany de força.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de força.

reaction.name: Reversal
entries: When a creature the reverser can see within 30 feet of it regains hit points, the reverser reduces the number of hit points regained to 0, and the reverser deals 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de força to the creature.

items.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Animated Tree
languages: understands Common, Druidic, Elvish, and Sylvan but cannot speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The blood hunter can innately cast {@spell hex}. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència.

trait.name: Blood Curse of Binding (1/Dia)
entries: As a bonus action, the blood hunter targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or have its speed reduced to 0 and be unable to take reactions. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The blood hunter té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The blood hunter té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The blood hunter attacks twice with a weapon.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Bol'bara's innate spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Dark One's Blessing
entries: When Bol'bara reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 6 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: Bol'bara can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Bol'bara fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Eldritch Blast (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany de força.

legendary.name: Incorporeal Dash
entries: Bol'bara moves up to her speed. She pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força if she ends her turn inside an object.

legendary.name: Zone of Calamity (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: A 15-foot-radius sphere of magical confusion extends from a point Bol'bara can see within 60 feet of her and s'extèn per les cantonades. Each creature that starts its turn in that area is treated as if targeted by the {@spell confusion} spell (save {@dc 12}). The sphere lasts as long as Bol'bara maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Bladed Hide
entries: A l'inici de cada torn seu, the moorbounder deals 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant to any creature grappling it.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The moorbounder pot arribar a saltar 40 peus de longitud i 20 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The moorbounder fa dos atacs: one with its blades and one with its claws.

action.name: Blades
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Core Spawn Crawler
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)
languages: understands Deep Speech però no pot parlar

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The crawler té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de crawler's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The crawler fa quatre atacs: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Saviesa amb {@dc 11} o become {@condition frightened} until the start of the crawler's next turn.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Core Spawn Emissary
languages: understands Deep Speech però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The emissary té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The emissary makes three talons attacks.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Alluring Thrum (Recharges 5-6)
entries: The emissary emits a dreadful yet alluring hum. Each creature within 20 feet of the emissary that can hear it and that isn't an aberration ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Crystal Spores {@recharge}
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic crystalline spores extends out from the emissary. The spores spread around corners. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de verí a l'inici de cada torn seu. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The seer can traverse through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the seer doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The seer té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The seer uses Fission Staff twice, Psychedelic Orb twice, or each one once.

action.name: Fission Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany radiant, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Psychedelic Orb
entries: The seer hurls a glimmering orb at one creature it can see within 120 of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 19} or take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany psíquic and suffer a random condition until the start of the seer's next turn. Roll a {@dice d6} for the condition: (1-2) {@condition blinded}, (3-4) {@condition frightened}, or (5-6) {@condition stunned}.

reaction.name: Fuse Damage
entries: When the seer is hit by an attack, it takes only half of the triggering damage. The first time the seer hits with a melee attack on its next turn, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany radiant.

monster.name: Core Spawn Worm
languages: understands Deep Speech però no pot parlar

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The worm sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius.

trait.name: Radiant Mirror
entries: If the worm takes radiant damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The worm fa dos atacs: one with its barbed tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Barbed Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}25 ({@damage 5d6 + 8}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 18} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}. The tentacles can grapple only one creature at a time.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 5d8 + 8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18} or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc at the start of each of the worm's turns.

Si the worm rep 30 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Frost Giant Zombie
languages: understands Giant però no pot parlar

trait.name: Numbing Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Unless the save succeeds, the creature can't make more than one attack, or take a bonus action on that turn.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is fire, radiant, or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The zombie makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Hurl Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Freezing Stare
entries: The zombie targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de fred and be {@condition paralyzed} fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Freezing Body
entries: A creature that touches the worm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the worm dies, it explodes in a burst of frigid energy. Each creature within 60 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Creatures inside the worm when it dies automatically fail this saving throw.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The worm makes two bite attacks, or uses its Trill and makes a bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20} or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred at the start of each of the worm's turns.

Si the worm rep 30 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de the worm.

action.name: Trill
entries: The frost worm emits a haunting cry. Each creature within 60 feet of the worm that can hear ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 20} or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage and al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature successfully saves against this effect, or if this effect ends for it, that creature is immune to the Trill of all frost worms for the next 24 hours. Frost worms are immune to this effect.

monster.name: Gearkeeper Construct
languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The gearkeeper és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Rapid Shifting
entries: Opportunity attacks made against the gearkeeper have disadvantage.

trait.name: Whirling Blades
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the gearkeeper takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gearkeeper makes two Arm Blade attacks, or one Arm Blade attack and one Spear Launcher attack.

action.name: Arm Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear Launcher
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 90 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Shrapnel Blast {@recharge}
entries: The gearkeeper jettisons a spray of jagged metal en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany perforant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Gloomstalker
languages: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Shadowstep
entries: As a bonus action, the gloomstalker can teleport up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the gloomstalker té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gloomstalker fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Snatch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 17} per escapar). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Shriek {@recharge}
entries: The gloomstalker emits a terrible shriek. Each enemy within 60 feet of the gloomstalker that can hear ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the enemy's next turn.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The wolf té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wolf fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Horizonback Tortoise
languages: understands Goblin però no pot parlar

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The tortoise pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Massive Frame
entries: The tortoise can carry up to 20,000 pounds of weight atop its shell, but moves at half speed if the weight exceeds 10,000 pounds. Medium or smaller creatures can move underneath the tortoise while it's not {@condition prone}.

Any creature under the tortoise when it falls {@condition prone} is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 18} per escapar). Until the grapple ends, the creature is {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 3d12 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Defensa Closca {@recharge 4}
entries: The tortoise withdraws into its shell, falls {@condition prone}, and gains a +5 bonus to AC. While the tortoise is in its shell, its speed is 0 and can't increase. The tortoise can emerge from its shell as an action, whereupon it is no longer {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Husk Zombie
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Curse of the Husk
entries: A humanoid slain by a melee attack from the zombie revives as a husk zombie on its next turn.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: Si hi ha dany que redueix al zombi a 0 punts de cop, ha de salvar Constitució amb CD de 5 + el dany rebut (si el dany no és radiant o crític). Si supera, el zombi es queda amb 1 punt de cop i no 0.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The zombie makes two claw attacks. For each of these attacks that reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the zombie can make an additional claw attack.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Husk Zombie Bursters
entries: Some husk zombies become bloated with disease and bile, their frenzied state pushing them to rush other living creatures, explode, and spread their horrid infection. A husk zombie burster has the following additional action option:

entries.name: Burst
entries: The zombie explodes and is destroyed. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 12 Constitució saving throw. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A humanoid creature killed by this damage rises as a husk zombie after 1 minute.

trait.name: Messy End
entries: The kobold explodes 3 rounds after it dies, or immediately if it was killed by a critical hit. The explosion destroys the kobold's body, leaving its equipment behind. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding kobold ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kobold té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kobold's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the kobold té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The merrow és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 6. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The merrow has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The merrow pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the merrow can pull it 10 feet closer.

action.name: Llampec (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: The merrow unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The moorbounder pot arribar a saltar 40 peus de longitud i 20 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Mossback Steward
languages: understands Goblin, Common, and Primordial però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Mossback Steward és Saviesa ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament, requiring no material components.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the nergaliid can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The nergaliid pot arribar a saltar 30 peus de longitud i 20 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 15} o become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. La criatura {@condition poisoned} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Tongue Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Siphon Life {@recharge 4}
entries: The nergaliid magically draws the life from a humanoid it can see within 40 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. An {@condition incapacitated} target fails the save automatically. Si falla, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic, and the nergaliid gains temporary hit points equal to the damage taken. Si supera, l'objectiu rep la meitat del dany, and the nergaliid doesn't gain temporary hit points. If this damage kills the target, its body rises at the end of the nergaliid's current turn as a {@creature husk zombie|EGW} (see earlier in this chapter).

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Pellinost és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The warlock és Carisma ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The warlock té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The warlock can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The warlock can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The warlock fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its Sword of Fathoms.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Sword of Fathoms
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant, and if the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or begin choking. The choking creature is {@condition incapacitated} fins el final del seu proper torn. when the effect ends on it.

action.name: Eldritch Blast (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força.

variant.name: Rod of Retribution
entries: Sahuagin warlocks of Uk'otoa who have exceptional potential in the eyes of the leviathan lord are granted a {@item rod of retribution|egw} in addition to Uk'otoa's typical blessing, the Sword of Fathoms. A sahuagin warlock of Uk'otoa holding this rod gains the following reaction:

entries.name: Retribution (3/Dia)
entries: When a creature the warlock can see within 60 feet of it damages the warlock, la criatura ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The sea fury és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The sea fury pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the sea fury falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The sea fury té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sea fury fa dos atacs with its claws.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Death Glare
entries: The sea fury targets one {@condition frightened} creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or drop to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: As Water
entries: The sea fury transforms into a wave of foaming seawater, along with whatever it is wearing or carrying, and moves up to its speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat. While in this form, it can't be {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}. It reverts to its true form at the end of this movement.

legendary.name: Fearsome Apparition (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The sea fury conjures an apparition of one of its dead sisters, which appears in an unoccupied space the sea fury can see within 30 feet of it. Enemies of the sea fury that can see the apparition ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition frightened} of it until it vanishes at the end of the sea fury's next turn.

legendary.name: Conjure Snakes (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The sea fury disgorges a swarm of poisonous snakes, which occupies the same space as the sea fury, acts on its own initiative count, and attacks as directed by the sea fury. The sea fury can control up to three of these swarms at a time.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the shadowghast ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to this Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadowghast can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The shadowghast fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany tallant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature other than an undead, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The abomination can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Powerful Build
entries: Sken counts as one size larger when determining her carrying capacity and the weight she can push, drag, or lift.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Sken wears a ring of obscuring. With it, she can cast the fog cloud spell centered on herself three times per day. The cloud lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dos mans.

reaction.name: Stone's Endurance (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: When Sken takes damage, she can use her reaction to reduce the damage taken by 8 ({@dice 1d12 + 2}).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Només en forma de Lizardfolk)
headerEntries: Skr'a S'orsk és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Skr'a S'orsk has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The basilisk pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Petrifying Secretions
entries: A creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} if it hits the basilisk with a weapon attack while within 5 feet of it or if it starts its turn {@condition grappled} by the basilisk. Unless the save succeeds, the creature magically begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The basilisk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar).

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the udaak es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un slam, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 21} or be pushed up to 20 feet away from the udaak and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The udaak fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The udaak fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its slam.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 21} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the udaak can't bite another target.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The udaak makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the udaak, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the udaak's turns.

Si the udaak rep 30 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de the udaak. If the udaak dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Vox Seeker
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Voice Lock
entries: The vox seeker must move toward and attack the source of the nearest voice within 60 feet of it, to the exclusion of all other targets, for as long as it remains operational.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The vox seeker pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant mes 3 lightning damage.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Yinra té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Yinra has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.
